name: Star Extreme Galaxy Stunt Car Wars Games
name_original: Star Extreme Galaxy Stunt Car Wars Games
description:
Star Extreme Galaxy Stunt Car Wars Games

Enjoy running with all kinds of Galaxy Stunt Car cars with different powers.
Drive the fastest sports cars of the world at extreme speed and feel the asphalt of the track burning!
Drive like a real professional racer to leave your furious rivals behind!
Enjoy the realistic driving mechanics and its smooth controls. Remember not to drift to be reach faster speeds!
Race realistic and challenging AI rivals.
Beware! Sports Car Racing is extremely addictive with stunning cars and cool music.
This is not about city parking or driving a truck on the street: This is real action.
Download and experience the most exhilarating handheld racing fun!

HOW TO PLAY:

• Tilt your cell phone to steer left or right
• Tap on the boost on the bottom right of the screen to accelerate.
• Drive as fast as you can in the endless straight highway. No speed limit.

Features:

Free game
Easy to play
Cool background music
Stunning sports cars
